Title: White Meditation / Pooja Organic Goodness Gift Box - Incense Cones, Burner, T Lights & Aroma
Honeysuckle Aroma Burner Set
Description:
Subtle, lingering, sensuous scents!

One of the most loved fresh floral fragrances, this lovely sweet scent is pure pleasure for the senses.
Description_All:
Content
1 Ceramic Burner, 2 Tea Light Candle and 10 ml Oil
Story
Little Pleasures The morning dew drops sparkle bright in the rays of the sun, colourful butterflies
dance from flower to flower as the soft spring breeze blows gently over fresh blooms, filling the
atmosphere with their sweet fragrance. You stand there soaking it all in, reveling in the little
pleasures of life! Inspired from nature and its goodness, we bring to you an incredible selection of
charming fragrances. Vibrant, fresh and new, this range is sure to captivate your heart and make you
smile.

Title: Lily of the Valley Aroma Burner Set
Description:
Subtle, lingering, sensuous scents!

Floating on the soft breeze of the English countryside, the delicate scent of dainty little lily blossoms is simply wonderful. One of nature’s most beloved fragrance, it’s hard not to fall in love with it.
Description_All:
Content
1 Ceramic Burner, 2 Tea Light Candle and 10 mil. Oil
Story
Little Pleasures The morning dew drops sparkle bright in the rays of the sun, colourful butterflies
dance from flower to flower as the soft spring breeze blows gently over fresh blooms, filling the
atmosphere with their sweet fragrance. You stand there soaking it all in, reveling in the little
pleasures of life! Inspired from nature and its goodness, we bring to you an incredible selection of
charming fragrances. Vibrant, fresh and new, this range is sure to captivate your heart and make you
smile.
How to Use
Just add a couple of drops to the diffuser burner or potpourri to have your ambience smelling
wonderful with its delicate fragrance.

Title: Ivory Musk Aroma Burner Set

Subtle, lingering, sensuous scents.
